round_best: Develop an integrated AI framework that utilizes graph neural networks (GNNs) to model the complex interactions between DNA sequences, epigenomic modifications, and gene expressions. This framework would construct a multi-layered graph where nodes represent genomic elements (genes, promoters, enhancers), and edges represent biochemical interactions and epigenetic signals. The GNN would then be trained to predict gene expression patterns based on the dynamic state of these interactions, providing a holistic view of the transcriptional regulation landscape.
